title: The Broken Kingdoms Box Set
description: A rebellious princess. A cursed rogue. A forbidden love that will bring a kingdom to its knees.Filled with luscious world building, banter-filled romance, and epic battles. Enjoy the first four books in the Broken Kingdoms series in one set.Included in this set:The Northern Kingdom: Beauty and the Beast meet VikingsCurse of Shadows and ThornsCourt of Ice and AshCrown of Blood and RuinThe Eastern Kingdom: Cinderella meets VikingsNight of Masks and Knives
author: L.J. Andrews
